data.title: Louisiana Ragin' Cajuns
data.meta_description: Greg Davis (20) First Base/Third Base - 2014 Season Saw action in 37 games making 25 starts with 15 coming at first base…Hit .314 in 86 at bats with five dou...
data.text:
2014 Season

Saw action in 37 games making 25 starts with 15 coming at first base…Hit .314 in 86 at bats with five doubles, a triple and three home runs…Drove in 23 runs and scored 20 times during the season…Slugged .500 with a .388 on base percentage drawing 12 walks while striking out only 13 times…Had two sac bunts and four sac flies…Was 6-for-6 in stolen base attempts…Notched seven multi-hit games including three games with a season-best three hits…Had a five-game hit streak during the season…Had five multi-RBI efforts…Drove in a career-best five runs on the road at South Alabama (May 10)…Also drove in four runs against ULM (May 15)…Had a streak of 12 RBI in a three game stretch.

Prior to Louisiana

Played corner infield positions for North Central Texas Community College, the same JUCO program that provided the Cajuns with recent stars Chad Keefer and Jordan Harrison…Named a NJCAA All-American as a sophomore after hitting .434 with 20 doubles, eight home runs…Hit .375 with 11 doubles, five home runs and 34 RBI on his way to being named to the Region 5 North All-Conference team and a Texas Junior College All-Star selection as a freshman…Was a three year letterwinner and an All-State selection at DeSoto High School where he hit .586 wth seven home runs as a senior.

Personal

Full name is Gregory Lawrence Davis…Born on May 5, 1993 in Dallas, Texas…Son of Larry and Traci Davis…Has a younger brother, Geoff…His cousin, Cory Whitlock played baseball at Sam Houston State…Majoring in general studies.
